name: Sweet Thing
description:
The ‘Sweet Thing’ Shirt is an example of the dedication, care, and 
attention that goes into a Lhome product. Every shirt has been hand 
printed with a custom ink sprayed finish to put together something 
special. I wanted the bold, playful design to almost burst out of the 
confines of the shirt. This took a great deal of time and effort to hand print over seams and edges. I hope you’ll agree they were worth the effort and the result is a unique print that definitely isn’t the shy, retiring type and destined to be a favourite in your collection.

The print run was quite limited on this one so as always, 
once they’re gone...they’re gone!

Due to the nature of the hand printing, there may be small imperfections through the print run. Each shirt is checked and double checked to make sure that we are happy with it before sending out.
